eprint.title: Elliptic curves suitable for pairing based cryptography
eprint.abstract:
We give a method for constructing ordinary elliptic curves over finite
prime field $\mathbb{F}_p$ with small security parameter $k$ with respect to
a prime $\ell$ dividing the group order $\#E(\mathbb{F}_p)$ such that $p<<\ell^2$.
eprint.publication_info: Published elsewhere. Unknown where it was published
